original_text: and the avenger of blood finds him outside the boundaries of his city of refuge, and the avenger of blood kills the manslayer, he shall not be guilty of blood.
korean_text: 피를 보복하는 자가 도피성 지경 밖에서 그 살인자를 만나 죽일지라도 피 흘린 죄가 없나니

sentences.original_text: and the avenger of blood finds him
outside the boundaries of his city of refuge,
and the avenger of blood kills the manslayer,
he shall not be guilty of blood.
